description: There's a pretty basic rule around Next Door Studios that Rod Daily knows all too well. Either way, he gets what is cumming to him, as both Rod and Angelo take turns fucking his holes from both sides, before they all three shower Adam with the residuals of his hard earned defeat.Enjoy!
series: R111 - Rod Daily, Angelo Romani & Adam Pain
title: BETS OF PLEASURE
